reviewText: I love this show but this is actually a region 4 pal DVD not a region 0 it says it on the back near the very bottom just thought y'all should know that
It was awesome! When will season 3 and 4 be available ?

This is one of the funniest shows ever. I do have all 4 seasons and they just get funnier with each season. There are so many wonderful things to say about this show, it's a shame it only went on for 4 seasons with the original cast. there is a season 5, but don't bother, the cast is terrible.
I got these for my niece and she absolutely loved them and is waiting for the next 3 seasons to come out

This was also good,as good as season one,I do miss Amy though,I wanted to see which one got the girl,Kevin or Brad. I purchased this series just to see Jay Ryan from Beauty & the Beast,but really liked the show, I'm in the US so I'm not sure If I'll be able to see the rest of the seasons,my player sometimes doesn't read DVD's for Pacific media, but I have seen it on Windows 8.1 on my laptop,I highly recommend it to all B&B fans.
This series has a great theme with terrific actors and great writing.  Love the music from New Zealand just wish more of it were available in the US. I've recommended this series to numerous friends.
